cab.content: Military Secret.6234'/--://---From Viceroy, Army Department, 21st June 1917.(Received at India Office, 10.30 a.m., 22nd.)9155. Mahsud operations. On 19th, advance of Force from HaidariKach to Barwand was opposed on hills east of that place, and on Barwandplateau, by lashkar estimated at 1,500, which was driven back. On nightof 19th-20th, heavy attack on camp picket was repulsed. Our casualtieson 19th : killed, five, Indian ranks ; wounded, one British, one Indianofficer, two British and 31 Indian ranks.
